data.text: @ChukFarley We sincerely apologize for the delay, Chuk. We have already forwarded your latest message to the office concerned. We'll send you a message as soon as we have news.
@mochiwoo98 Hello, @mochiwoo98! We're trying to send you a DM for us to check further on your concern, however the option is unavailable. Kindly make sure the DM feature is enabled.
@hartepinephrine Hi, Gab. We're sorry to hear this. We have sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@RaissaBlanc It may take up to 3-5 billing cycles for the amount to reflect on your account, Raissa.

@NevilleNorman2 We have released an advisory regarding this, Neville. You may view it through the link below. 

https://t.co/bGj3RhgfCf

urls.title: Cebu Runway Overshoot
urls.description: The runway at Mactan Cebu airport (CEB) is closed due to a disabled aircraft of a foreign airline that is obstructing the runway after a landing incident which occurred late Sunday evening. Flights are unable to take off and land until clearing operations are completed. This is a developing situation. We shall keep you posted as new information comes in. Affected passengers will be accommodated on the next available flights out of Manila and Cebu, subject to space availability. ▪︎ Rebook within 60 days

data.text: @PerlieSanmuang Hi, Perlie. Thank you for taking the time to bring this matter to our attention. As of this writing, we do not have this promo. May we ask for a screenshot of the said link as well?
@mykeebebs Our apologies if we've made you feel this way, Mykee. We have responded to your dm. Kindly check.
@imkerwinking Hi, Kerwin! We have sent you a DM for us to assist you further on your concern. Kindly check.
@jgoesalexis Hi, J. Alexis. We're truly sorry for this. We have sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@NoOtherMon We were advised by the concerned station that meals are currently being provided to affected passengers, Monmon.

data.text: @NoOtherMon Para po sa inyong mga bagahe, maaari po kayong pumunta sa Carousel 6. Na-inform rin po kami na nakapagbigay ng snacks sa mga affected passengers at around 1 am at magkakaron rin po ng breakfast para sa inyo. Kindly let us know po if you still need further assistance. Salamat po.

@NoOtherMon Hi, Monmon. Muli, humihingi po kami ng paumanhin sa inconvenience na naidulot ng pagsasara ng runway sa Cebu airport. Ito po ay dahil sa landing incident ng isang foreign airline at beyond po ito sa control ng PAL.

(1/n)

data.text: @NoOtherMon Kami ay humihingi ng paumanhin, Monmon. Maaari po kayong lumapit sa aming airport staff for assistance. Ito rin po ay finorward na namin sa aming Cebu airport team para kayo ay mabigyan ng assistance.

@mykeebebs We apologize that you feel this way, Mykee. We are continuously coordinating with our Cebu airport team to provide assistance to the passengers of the affected flight due to the runway closure.

@mykeebebs Hello, Mykee. We're truly sorry to hear about this. Our airport team is doing its best to assist passengers during this time. You may approach them for immediate assistance. We are now coordinating with them about this.
@PebblesMarbles Hi, PebblesMarbles. Mask-wearing mandates are in effect. Passengers must wear face masks to be allowed for check-in and boarding. Thank you for your cooperation.

data.text: @nyvrana Thank you for your continued support, @nyvrana! ✈
@Gorgeousgwapa Hi, @Gorgeousgwapa. We are sorry to hear this. May we clarify the error prompt you encountered?

@aztec_inca We are sorry to hear about the long processing of your refund request, Jolly. We understand your frustrations.  Please let us know should you need further assistance. Thank you for your patience.
@triciamll Hi Tri. We regret to learn of your disappointment. You may approach any PAL representative for further assistance.
@RaissaBlanc We're sorry for the inconvenience this caused, Raissa. We assure you that your refund will be processed immediately.
@jehgan Got it, Kal. We'll have it checked.

@jehgan Hi, Kal. We're truly sorry to hear this. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. May we kindly request to send your booking details via dm so we can look into this?
@goriolakwatsero Hi Gary. We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.

@xiankitty @silverph Hi, Xianboracay. We assure you that this will be looked into. As of this writing, we are still waiting for the information of the passenger so we can have this coordinated with the office concerned. Thank you.
@kpopboi007 We're sorry if we've made you feel this way, @kpopboi007. We assure you that we will look into this once that we have the details of the passenger. Thank you.
@glometry Hi, Glometry! We've received your DM. We've also requested for an update on your behalf and have tagged your concern as urgent. We'll ensure to update you the soonest we have news.
@silverph Hi! We're sorry to hear about this. May we know if you're able to approach any of our airport personnel for further assistance?
@itsnigelm We replied to your direct message, Nigel. Thank you!
@birii_kun In this case, we regret to inform you that we have limited access to third party bookings. Thus, please coordinate with your issuing agent for further assistance.
@birii_kun Hi, Billy. May we confirm if this booking was made directly with us?
@AgnesLianesa We have responded to your dm, Lianesa. Kindly check.
@chengtolentino Hi, chengtolentino. As checked, PR655 Riyadh-Manila October 21 was cancelled due to operational requirements.

@MIKEElovesU Hi, @MIKEElovesU. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the schedule change. Please know that we would not disrupt a flight unless deemed necessary. May we know if you wish to re-book your flight?
@AgnesLianesa You're welcome.
@suesurreal24 @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Su San! We've sent you a DM for your booking details, in order for us to check. Thank you!
@stevemiguel @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Steve. Our @PALMabuhayMiles team will be happy to assist you on this. :)
@zzzegger We're sorry to hear about your experience, @zzzegger. We've sent you a DM for us to look into your concern. Thank you.

@kouytweets Hi, Kouy. We are sorry for the inconvenience. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser? Have you also tried checking on our Mobile App?
@pediakidney We're sorry to hear about your experience, Doc Marvin. We've sent you a DM for us to look into your concern. Thank you.
@PolcangNAMO We've responded to your DM. Thank you!

@stevemiguel @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Steve. Kindly try booking online or via app without placing the MM number first. Once you have received your booking confirmation, kindly send us a DM with your MM number so we can input it on your booking. Thank you.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

urls.title: Get your PAL Supersavers!
urls.description: Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Make opportunities fly when you book now with PAL Supersavers for as low as P498 one-way economy base fare to visit local destinations and more! Pro tip: Rebooking must be done 24 hours before flight. Terms and Conditions Apply What's PAL Supersavers? PAL Supersavers is PAL's constant affordable domestic fares offering for those looking to travel in style yet within budget
